Texts.Eng:
Hey there, friendo! I'm ^orange;Dr. Akaggy^white;, and I deal in robots! So I have this experimental ^green;modular space mech^white; in need of a test drive and my usual pilots are... Indisposed. Could you do me a favor and ^green;fly it through my test course^white;? 

Just ^green;talk to me when you're ready to go^white;!
Talk to ^orange;Dr. Akaggy^reset; to enter the ^orange;test course^reset;

You made it back! That's not surprise in my voice, it's elation! As a reward, I can give you enough ^green;spare mech components^white; for you to deploy your own mech for space travel! Head over to that ^orange;mech assembly station^white; to customise it!
